Update Notes
=============

Release 1.0.3

Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue with asset caching and optimization that was causing
some users significant stalls and occasional crashes while playing.
This update also includes a one-time verification of assets on
startup to repair any potential cache issues introduced by
prior patch

=============
